testcase.name: Buy a flight in latam
testcase.system-out: Given that alice wanted to login............................................passed When she enters to her account with her information.........................passed Then she will verify that she entered correctly.............................passed When alice enters the search criteria.......................................passed Then she will verify that she found at least one flight.....................passed Given she wanted to select a flight randomly................................passed When she enters the data of the adult passengers............................passed And she enters the data of the children passengers..........................passed And she enters the data of the babies passengers............................passed And she enters contact information..........................................passed Then she will verify your reservation.......................................passed When she selects the payment method.........................................passed Then she will verify your reservation code..................................passed
